title: Where the plot abuts a trained nallah, the marginal open space along the nallah shall not be insisted upon beyond 4
clause_text: Where the plot abuts a trained nallah, the marginal open space along the nallah shall not be insisted upon beyond 4.5 m. from the edge of the trained nallah or as per requirement of SWD Department of, whichever is greater.
section: Relaxation in Building and other requirements â€“
